Luxury Appliance Repair in Los Angeles, CA

Elite, White-Glove Service for the City of Dreams

In a city like Los Angeles, where innovation meets sophistication, your home is more than a place to live—it’s a reflection of your standards. From the architectural icons of Beverly Hills and Bel Air to the sleek penthouses of Downtown LA, your appliances are essential to maintaining a life of effortless luxury. When something needs service, it deserves to be handled with the same attention to quality that it was built with.

At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we provide certified luxury appliance repair in Los Angeles, specializing in the world’s finest brands like Sub-Zero, Wolf, Thermador, Miele, Gaggenau, Viking, La Cornue, and more. Our team delivers white-glove service, genuine OEM parts, and exceptional care for homes where excellence is the expectation.

🔧 Why Los Angeles Homeowners Trust ZARICCI

  • ✅ Certified Technicians Across Leading Brands
    From smart refrigeration and custom wine storage to professional-grade ovens and steam appliances, our team is trained and certified by the most prestigious manufacturers.
  • ✅ Genuine OEM Parts for Superior Repairs
    We use only manufacturer-certified parts—protecting your appliance’s performance, appearance, and warranty.
  • ✅ Same-Day or Next-Day Service Throughout LA
    Your time is valuable. We offer priority scheduling and arrive promptly—whether you’re in Brentwood, Hollywood Hills, Santa Monica, or anywhere across Greater Los Angeles.
  • ✅ White-Glove In-Home Service
    Our technicians work quietly, respectfully, and cleanly—ensuring your home is treated with as much care as your appliance.

🛠️ What We Repair in Los Angeles

❄️ Luxury Refrigerators & Freezers

  • Sub-Zero, Thermador, Miele
  • Cooling inconsistencies, frost buildup
  • Ice maker failures or smart system malfunctions
  • Built-in and integrated refrigeration repairs

🔥 Ranges, Ovens & Cooktops

  • Wolf, La Cornue, Gaggenau, Viking
  • Gas burner ignition issues
  • Uneven heating, convection fan failures
  • Smart oven connectivity or touchscreen malfunctions

🚿 High-End Dishwashers

  • Miele, Bosch, Cove
  • Water drainage or drying issues
  • Leaks, control panel failures, or smart error codes

🧺 Luxury Washers & Dryers

  • Miele, Fisher & Paykel, LG Signature
  • Drum not spinning or draining
  • Dryer overheating or not heating
  • Smart integration and app troubleshooting

☕ Built-In Specialty Appliances

  • Wine fridges, espresso machines, steam ovens, warming drawers
  • Temperature control failures
  • Pump, motor, and electronic control board repairs
  • Smart home and Wi-Fi system integration

👨‍🔧 The ZARICCI Signature Experience

  1. Effortless Scheduling
    Call or book online—our concierge team ensures quick, discreet coordination around your schedule.

    A trained ZARICCI technician arrives on time, in uniform, with the specialized equipment needed for accurate, respectful diagnostics.
  3. Transparent Estimates
    You’ll receive a clear, detailed quote upfront—no hidden charges, no unexpected surprises.
  4. Precision Repairs Using OEM Parts
    Our repairs are performed to factory standards using authentic parts, restoring your appliance’s peak performance.
  5. Thorough Testing and Immaculate Clean-Up
    After rigorous testing, we leave your space clean, your appliance fully functional, and your experience backed by our service warranty.
